full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I SNYING PO DANG NYE SNYING DANG RTZA SNGAGS RNAMS KYIS RJES GNANG BYED TSUL LEGS PAR BZHUGS PA'I DBU PHYOGS LAGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I SNYING PO NYE SNYING RTZA SNGAGS RNAMS KYI RJES SU GNANG BA BYED PA'I TSUL GO BDE BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA CHOS SKYONGS DNGOS GRUB DANG, BKA' BCU 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RIN CHEN PA LA SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DAM PA SNGA MA RNAMS KYI MAN NGAG DANG, BLA MAS GSUNG SGROS LA BRTEN NAS, GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA LHA'I BTZUN PA RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO'I GLO GROS DPAL BZANG PO BDAG GIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DKA' BZHI 'DZIN PA NAM MKHA' DPAL BZANG PO, ,'DIS KYANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO'I BLO GROS,
